title: Elastic Circular Motion

children.value:
A mass, 
$\vari{m}$
 of 
$\quantity{0.050}{kg}$
 is attached to one end of a piece of elastic of unstretched length, 
$\valuedef{l}{0.50}{m}$
. The force constant, 
$\vari{k}$
 of the elastic (i.e. the force required to produce unit extension) is 
$\quantity{40}{N\,  m\sup {-1}}$
. The mass is rotated steadily on a smooth table around a fixed point in a horizontal circle of radius 
$\valuedef{r}{0.70}{m}$
.
What is the approximate speed of the mass?
